DOC.brief_summary: The aim study perspectively compare anatomical functional outcome Pelvic Organ Prolapse ( POP ) repair Laparoscopic Robotic-assisted Colposacropexy .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Laparoscopic Vs Robotic-assisted Colposacropexy Pelvic Organ Prolapse Repair
DOC.detailed_description: Female pelvic floor disorder rank amongst common disorder affect woman include condition urinary incontinence pelvic organ prolapse ( POP ) . POP estimate affect 30 % woman age 50- 89 year , lifetime risk require surgery 11 % . Open abdominal sacrocolpopexy establish gold standard procedure indicate prolapse anterior and/or apical vaginal wall compartment . Laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy ( LSCP ) widely adopt demand skill motivation associate long learn curve . So hypothesis robot-assisted laparoscopic approach sacrocolpopexy ( RALSCP ) could alternative pure laparoscopic technique . In study design 62 patient randomly enrol ( 31 laparoscopic arm 31 robotic assist one ) . The primary outcome anatomic one , secondary outcome functional term storage void dysfunction , sexual dysfunction , bowel dysfunction , QoL , post operative complication . For continuous variable use Mann-Withney test , categorical data use McNemar test X2 test .
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic POP > 2 stage accord POP Q system Obesity Heart failure ( NYHA IIIIV ) High stage COPD ( Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ) Patients underwent 2 previous abdominal surgical procedure
